hanbok.name: Rose Pink Hanbok
hanbok.description: This hanbok is consist of jacket and dress. This Korean traditional costume is Perfect for Halloween party, cosplay party, theme party, portray, festival, casual, formal,etc. Machine wash cold and gentle cycle. No bleach.
